Package com.threecrickets.prudence.util

Class Summary
ByteArrayRepresentation A Representation based on an array bytes.
CacheControlFilter A Filter that adds cache control directives to responses.
CapturingRedirector A Redirector that keeps track of the captured reference.
CapturingRoute A Route that always scores 0.0 for captured requests.
CapturingRouter A Router that uses CapturingRedirector and CapturingRoute to allow for URI capturing.
CompressedStringRepresentation This is a ByteArrayRepresentation that can be constructed using text and an encoding, which it then compresses into bytes according the encoding.
ConversationCookie A modifiable extension of a regular Cookie.
CssUnifyMinifyFilter A Filter that automatically unifies and/or compresses CSS source files, saving them as a single file.
DebugRepresentation An HTML representation of lots of Prudence and Restlet state useful for debugging.
Fallback A restlet that delegates Restlet.handle(Request, Response) to a series of targets in sequence, stopping at the first target that satisfies the condition of Fallback.wasHandled(Request, Response).
FallbackRouter A Router that takes care to bunch identical routes under Fallback restlets.
FileParameter A parameter for files.
FormWithFiles A form that can parse MediaType.MULTIPART_FORM_DATA entities by accepting file uploads.
Injector A Filter that adds values to the request attributes before moving to the next restlet.
InstanceUtil Utility methods to assist in accessing the running Prudence instance.
IoUtil Utility methods for I/O and files.
JavaScriptUnifyMinifyFilter A Filter that automatically unifies and/or compresses JavaScript source files, saving them as a single file.
LoggingUtil Utility methods for logging.
NormalizingRedirector A Redirector that normalizes relative paths.
PhpExecutionController An execution controller that exposes PHP-style predefined variables ("superglobals") to executables.
PreheatTask A Runnable that does a GET request on a an internal URI, making sure that the resource is ready to use without the delay of compilation and initializing resources, such as connecting to databases, etc.
ResolvingRedirector A Redirector that uses ResolvingTemplate.
ResolvingRouter A Router that uses ResolvingTemplate for all routes.
ResolvingTemplate A Template that allows control over which Resolver instances it will use.
StatusRestlet A restlet that sets a specific status.
UnifyMinifyFilter A Filter that automatically unifies and/or minifies source files, saving them as a single file.
